English: The dog is next to the school
The hospital is behind the school
The doctor gets up at 7 every day

Pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang jiǔ diǎn qǐchuáng
English: I get up at 9 every morning

Hanzi: 我每天从九点到五点下班
Pinyin: Wǒ měitiān Cóng jiǔ diǎn dào wǔ diǎn Xiàbān
English: I work from 9 to 5 every day

Pinyin: Wǒmen wǎnshàng liù diǎn chī wǎnfàn
English: We eat dinner at 6 in the evening
